Appearance
From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: dns and DN:s

Translingual

[edit]

Symbol

[edit]

DNS

  1. (international standards, aviation) IATA airport code for Denison Municipal Airport, which serves Denison, Iowa, United States.

English

[edit]

Proper noun

[edit]

DNS

  1. (Internet) Initialism of Domain Name System.
  2. (computing, Internet) The protocol used by the Domain Name System.
  3. (Internet) Domain Name Services; the services provided by the Domain Name System.

Phrase

[edit]

DNS

  1. (sports) Initialism of does/did not start.
  2. (nautical) Initialism of do not sail.

See also

[edit]
  • (sports): DNF, DNQ, DSQ, DQ, Q

References

[edit]
  • Joyce, John. "Those Damn Network Acronyms". Scientific Computing, June 2007, pg. 12.

Anagrams

[edit]
  • DSN, NDs

German

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)

Noun

[edit]

DNS

  1. (biology) initialism of Desoxyribonukleinsäure (DNA)
  2. (computer science) initialism of direkte numerische Simulation (procedure to calculate unsteady streaming processes)
  3. (chemistry) initialism of Dinitrosalicylsäure
  4. (Germany, politics) initialism of Dachverband der Nationalen Sammlung
  5. (Germany, norming) initialism of Deutsche Normungsstrategie (strategic bias of the norming task)
  6. (computer science) initialism of Domain Name System

Derived terms

[edit]

(biology):

  • Alien-DNS

Hungarian

[edit]
 dezoxiribonukleinsav on Hungarian Wikipedia

Etymology

[edit]

Initialism of dezoxiribonukleinsav (“deoxyribonucleic acid”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): [ˈdeːjɛnɛʃ]

Noun

[edit]

DNS (plural DNS-ek)

  1. (genetics) DNA

Declension

[edit]

accusative DNS-t DNS-eket
dative DNS-nek DNS-eknek

translative DNS-sé DNS-ekké
terminative DNS-ig DNS-ekig
essive-formal DNS-ként DNS-ekként

superessive DNS-en DNS-eken

Japanese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from English DNS.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): [dʲiːe̞nɯ̟e̞sɨ]

Proper noun

[edit]

DNS(ディーエヌエス) • (Dīenuesu) 

  1. (Internet) Initialism of Domain Name System.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • D(ディー)N(エヌ)S(エス)サーバー (dīenuesu sābā)

Phrase

[edit]

DNS(ディーエヌエス) • (dīenuesu) 

  1. (sports) Initialism of did not start.

Related terms

[edit]
  • D(ディー)N(エヌ)F(エフ) (dīenuefu)

Latvian

[edit]

Noun

[edit]

DNS m (invariable)

  1. initialism of dezoksiribonukleīnskābe (“deoxyribonucleic acid”)

Spanish

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ˌde ˌene ˈese/ [ˌd̪e ˌe.ne ˈe.se]
  • Syllabification: DNS

Noun

[edit]

DNS m (plural DNS)

  1. initialism of dominio de nivel superior de código de país (“ccTLD”)
